message: This emoji clue isn't part of the official game, but it's a smiley reminder to keep searching!
You're on the hunt, and that's no stunt! Find the next clue, and you're almost through!
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today. - Franklin D. Roosevelt
Did you know that honey never spoils? Keep searching for sweet surprises!
Why did the computer go to therapy? Because it had too many hardware issues! Keep hunting, no tech support needed here.
Can you do a 10-second dance when you find this clue? Bonus points for creativity!
You're doing an amazing job on this hunt! Keep up the good work!
Feeling puzzled? Don't worry, the answers are all around you.
You're doing great! Keep hunting, and success will be yours!
You're navigating these office waters like a pro! Keep paddling towards your next clue.
